title.rendered: Rehlat offers / coupon code: get flat 20 AED off at Spicejet

content.rendered:
You can Plan a perfect getaway to Incredible India with Spicejet and get flat 20 AED off.

Be it beaches or hills, city life or small-town charm, yummy street food or gastronomic experiences, India has it all! Hurry Up! Limited Period Offer

Booking validity: February 29, 2020

Travel validity: February 29, 2020

Coupon Code: SG20

Book your flight tickets with Rehlat and get flat 20 AED off at Spicejet

Terms and conditions:

  • Sale and travel validity is till 29th February 2020.
  • Applicable on Spicejet one-way or round trips from Dubai to Cochin, Madurai, Calicut, and Mangalore.
  • Use code: SG20 while booking to get flat 20 AED off.
  • Seats are limited and are subject to availability.
  • Standard terms and conditions and fare rules will continue to apply – please read the fare conditions online at the time of purchase as fare rules vary by ticket and destination.
  • Special fares are part of marketing promotions by Rehlat and are subjected to change without prior notice.
  • The fares published in promotions are in general base fare only and total fare might differ when taxes and fees are levied.
  • Rehlat shall not be liable to for any indirect, punitive, special, incidental or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the offer or any act or omission due to force majeure events.
  • Other terms and conditions apply. Please refer to the fare rules at the time of booking.
